snippet: The work of state and federal epidemiologists in identifying an outbreak of fungal meningitis and tying it to a tainted steroid highlights many of the strengths of government health agencies.
abstract: Work of state and federal epidemiologists in identifying an outbreak of fungal meningitis that was one of the most serious in American medical history, and tying it to the source of a tainted steroid, highlights many of the strengths of government health agencies.
lead_paragraph: The work of state and federal epidemiologists in identifying an outbreak of fungal meningitis and tying it to a tainted steroid highlights many of the strengths of government health agencies.

headline.seo: Doctors Chased Clues to Identify Meningitis Outbreak
